spec_data.Name: perl-Mail-SPF
spec_data.Description:
Mail::SPF is an object-oriented implementation of Sender Policy Framework
(SPF). See http://www.openspf.org for more information about SPF.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 01:05:50 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Object-oriented implementation of Sender Policy Framework
